sqlMap.update: UPDATE T_REALLY_NEWS SET CREATE_TIME = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, STATE = '0' WHERE PK = #id#
UPDATE T_REALLY_NEWS SET TITLE = #title#, SUB_TITLE = #subTitle#, IMG_LINK = #imgLink#, CREATE_TIME = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, STATE = #state# WHERE PK = #id#
sqlMap.select: SELECT n.PK, n.URL, replace(n.DOMAIN, '微信.', '') AS DOMAIN, n.IMG_LINK, n.TITLE, n.SUB_TITLE, n.CONTENT, n.STATE, DATE_FORMAT(n.CREATE_TIME,'%Y%m%d %H:%i:%S') AS CREATE_TIME, n.TRUTH_DEGREE, n.OPINION_TIMES, c.CONTENT AS COMMENT, c.PK AS COMMENT_ID FROM T_REALLY_NEWS n LEFT JOIN T_REALLY_COMMENT c ON n.PK = c.NEWS_ID WHERE n.PK = #id#

SELECT n.PK, replace(n.DOMAIN, '微信.', '') AS DOMAIN, n.IMG_LINK, n.TRUTH_DEGREE, c.PK AS COMMENT_ID, n.TITLE, LEFT(n.SUB_TITLE, 35) AS SUB_TITLE, n.URL, n.TRUTH_DEGREE, n.OPINION_TIMES, DATE_FORMAT(n.CREATE_TIME,'%m-%d') AS CREATE_TIME, n.OPINION_TIMES, n.STATE, u.USERNAME, p.PUBLIC_NAME, p.PUBLIC_NO FROM T_REALLY_NEWS n LEFT JOIN T_REALLY_USER u ON n.CREATOR_ID = u.PK LEFT JOIN T_MANAGE_WECHAT_PUBLIC p ON n.SOGOU_OPENID = p.OPEN_ID LEFT JOIN T_REALLY_COMMENT c ON n.PK = c.NEWS_ID

ORDER BY n.STATE DESC, n.CREATE_TIME DESC LIMIT #start#, #end#

sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO T_REALLY_NEWS( URL, DOMAIN, IMG_LINK, TITLE, SUB_TITLE, CONTENT, CREATE_TIME, CREATOR_ID, TRUTH_DEGREE, OPINION_TIMES, SOGOU_DOCID, SOGOU_OPENID, STATE) VALUES( #url#, #domain#, #imgLink#, #title#, #subTitle#, #content#, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #creator#, #truthDegree#, #opinionTimes#, #sogouDocid#, #sogouOpenid#, #state#)
sqlMap.select: SELECT PK FROM T_REALLY_NEWS WHERE SOGOU_DOCID = #sogouDocid#
SELECT n.PK, n.TITLE, n.STATE FROM T_REALLY_NEWS n WHERE n.CREATE_TIME <= date_sub(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, INTERVAL 2 DAY) AND n.STATE = '1'
sqlMap.delete: UPDATE T_REALLY_NEWS n SET n.STATE = '2' WHERE n.PK = #id#
